name: YOUTH DREAMERS FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Mission:-To create enormous opportunities through financial aid for children and the youth by conciliating government and corporate schemes and various grants.Vision:-To provide economical and cognitive support through grassroots initiative to underprivileged children and to the youth; being a pillar of support for civil society.What we do:(1)Youth Dreamers foundation provides services to Educational Institutions, NGOs and Donors to manage scholarships Bridges the gap between student and existing scholarship schemes (2) Launching new scholarship schemes Mentoring and counseling of the students (3) Creates awareness, about scholarship & Application support (4)Remedial centers (5)Skill Development Programme YDF has 4-5 employee
